title: Column icons not visible in connecting Derby database
OB: When expanding the 'Data Source' in the 'Available Items' section, the table icons are visible, but the column icons are missing.
EB: When expanding the 'Data Source' in the 'Available Items' section, both the table icons and column icons should be visible.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the 'Data Explorer' view, create a new 'Data Source' to connect to a Derby database using the following settings:
- Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
- Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
- User Name: root
- Password: root
4. After setting up the 'Data Source', create a dataset. 5. In the 'Edit Data Set' window, select 'Query'. 6. ... (additional steps if necessary)
